page.title: 04W.WHITECHURCH - PEOPLE
page.content: A compact village on the main A354 road from Dorchester to Blandford Forum. A static village with very little housing development. What little private building has been allowed by the County Council, despite pleas by the Parish Council, is priced so that young married people cannot afford to purchase resulting in an aging population and fewer children. All children living in the few County Council houses have now passed through the School and with the local farms employing fewer workers the prospects for the School are bleak. There are no organised activities in the village for young people who have to travel to nearby towns for such events. The School playing field is made available for youths and children at all times.
